name: Poor Rich
description:
POOR RICH - A pixel art RPG // GMTK Jam 2022 submission

entirely written in javascript from scratch... breaking my nerves for 3 days.
code, pixelart, graphics and sound all (c) by me.

Have fun!

This game and its idea is meant as social criticism and criticizes the growing gap between rich and poor. It also raises the question of whether our lives are determined or if we have the chance to choose whether we have a good start in life or not. Our world and our life is all we have and everyone has the opportunity to make the best out of it - for themselves and for other people.

Thanks for playing along.

CONTROLS (if you were born in the poor world).

Arrow keys, WASD, ENTER
